dmca.title: PC Bug Doctor Feverish Over Search Results to Alleged Infringing Sites
dmca.body:
[Private]
March 15, 2005
RE: PC Bug Doctor Copyright Infringement
On the Google search query, "PC Bug Doctor", sites with the URLs of http://www.moviecodec.com/topics/3552p1.html , http://www.moviecodec.com/topics/3552p2.html and

http://www.moviecodec.com/topics/4111p1.html are being displayed in the natural search results (please see attached screenshot),
Also on google search query "pc bug doctor code" they are also listed as well as other variations of these words. Also these sites under the above term http://www.astakiller_com/list/pc%20bug%20doctor.html
http://www.takdownload.com/archives/2004/12/pc_bug_doctor_1_1.php
These sites are illegally providing username and serial number info for Maximum Software Publishing, owner of PC Bug Doctor software (please see attached screenshot).
Contact information of infringing site (I know they haven't responded to you but please provide the telephone number and/or email address you used to contact them)
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly Infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner,
its agent, or the law.
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
Sincerely,

[Private]
President Maximum Software Publishing LLC 
AKA PC Bug Doctor
